AlaCarte - Class in rrpss
Stores information about a single alaCarte, particularly used in context of a menu.
AlaCarte(String, double, String, String) - Constructor for class AlaCarte
Constructs an ala carte item with the specified parameter
alaCartes - Variable in class Menu
List of alaCarte and setPackage, implemented in Vector data structure.
alaCartes - Variable in class Order
A HashMap used to store all AlaCarte objects ordered by the customer.
alaCartes - Variable in class SetPackage
Class SetPackage inherits attributes and methods from superclass Item
allocateTable(int) - Method in class TableManager
Returns a Table object that satistifies the number of person and the availability of the table.
availability - Variable in class Table
True if table is available (no active Order from the table or no active Reservation for this table)

B

BUFFER_TIME - Static variable in class ReservationManager

C

calculateTotalPrice() - Method in class OrderInvoice
This method will calculate the OrderInvoice.totalPrice, OrderInvoice.totalDiscount, OrderInvoice.totalGST and OrderInvoice.grandTotal.
cancelReservation(int) - Method in class ReservationManager
Cancels the reservation of the specified identified (id) by first getting the specified reservation object and then sets the status to "Cancelled" if the current status is "active" Returns 1 on successful cancellation, -1 otherwise.
capacity - Variable in class Table
Capacity of the table, only even number ranges from 2 until 10.
checkExpiry() - Method in class ReservationManager
Calls checkExpiry(Reservation) for every Reservation object stored in reservation list (reservations)
checkExpiry(Reservation) - Method in class ReservationManager
Checks the expiration of the specified Reservation object.
checkReservation(int) - Method in class ReservationManager
Checks the current reservation by first checking the expiration of all reservations (by calling checkExpiry) and then gets the Reservation object by its id (by calling getReservationById).
compareTo(AlaCarte) - Method in class AlaCarte
This method is used for sorting the alacarte item by type at Menu class
compareTo(Table) - Method in class Table
Compare to other Table object by capacity.
contact - Variable in class Customer
Contact details of this Customer
copy() - Method in class AlaCarte
Returns a duplicate of this object
copy() - Method in class SetPackage
Returns a duplicate of this object
createOrder(Calendar, Staff) - Method in class OrderManager
Creates a new Order object with no menu items at all initially.
createOrderInvoice(Order, boolean, int) - Method in class OrderInvoiceManager
This method will evoke the creation of OrderInvoice.
createReservation(Customer, Calendar, Table) - Method in class ReservationManager
Creates new Reservation for a specified Customer on a specified dateTime for an allocated Table.
Customer - Class in rrpss
Stores the information of all Customer, which includes the membership status, contact, and the reservation made.
Customer(String, int, boolean, String) - Constructor for class Customer
Constructs a Customer object with membership status, contact detail, and with name and id inherited from superclass Person
customer - Variable in class Reservation
Customer that made this Reservation.

Identifier (id) of this Person
id - Variable in class Reservation
Identifier (id) of this Reservation, should be unique positive integer, handled by ReservationManager
id - Variable in class Table
The table identifier (id), idiom for table number in real world.
idCounter - Variable in class Menu
Id of setPackages, which is equal to the size of setPackages vector.
idCounter - Variable in class OrderManager
An integer keeping track of the Order object ID in order to avoid having an Order object with the same ID as an existing Order object.
idCounter - Variable in class ReservationManager
Identifier (id) counter of the reservations, used to assign a unique id for new reservation.
Item - Class in rrpss
Stores information about an item of a Menu, AlaCarte and SetPackage.

An alias for System.out.print().
printInvoice() - Method in class OrderInvoice
This method will print the Order details, which breakdown of each menu item and the quantity that Customer purchase, the date and time when the Orderis created, and also display the price breakdown, from the OrderInvoice.totalPrice, membership OrderInvoice.totalDiscount, OrderInvoice.totalGST, and the final amount, OrderInvoice.grandTotal.
println(Object) - Static method in class RestaurantApp
An alias for System.out.println().
println() - Static method in class RestaurantApp
An alias for System.out.print() but only prints a newline character.

Prints the current Menu information to standard output in a nice format.
printOrder() - Method in class Order
Print the breakdown of items of this Order object.
printReport(String, Vector<OrderInvoice>) - Static method in class RevenueReport
Traverses through all the order invoice inside the argument orderInvoices to look for OrderInvoice object with the same date or month specified in period.
printReportByDay(Vector<OrderInvoice>) - Static method in class RevenueReport
Prints all OrderInvoice objects inside the Vector object passed in to this method.
printReportByMonth(Vector<OrderInvoice>) - Static method in class RevenueReport
Prints the top and least sales of the month with its date.
printReservation() - Method in class Reservation

ReservationManager - Class in rrpss
Manages the Reservation of the Restaurant by keeping track of list of reseration and a counter to help ensure the uniqueness of the id of reservation.

Constructs the ReservationManager object and initializes the reservation list to empty and id counter to 1.

Represents a restaurant in real life.

Constructs an Restaurant object, set Restaurant.name as the restaurant name and initialize the these attributes : orderManager, orderInvoiceManager, reservationManager, tableManager, and staffManager

The main application where the RRPSS works.

Prints a restaurant revenue report daily or monthly.
RevenueReport() - Constructor for class RevenueReport
Constructs nothing as this class does not have to be instantiated to print the revenue report of a restaurant.

T

table - Variable in class Reservation
Table object that is associated with this Reservation
Table - Class in rrpss
Stores information about a single table, particularly used in context of a restaurant.
Table(int, int) - Constructor for class Table
Constructs a table with specified id and capacity.
tableId - Variable in class OrderInvoice
Is the table identifier, to indicate from which Table the Order is made.
tableManager - Variable in class Restaurant
Manages tables in the restaurant.
TableManager - Class in rrpss
Manages the Table of the Restaurant by providing getters of the list of tables and individual table, various methods to add new table, remove existing table, and allocate table for an order.
TableManager() - Constructor for class TableManager
Constructs an TableManager object and initialize the attributes tables to empty and numTables to zero.
tables - Variable in class TableManager
List of tables, implemented in Vector data structure.
totalDiscount - Variable in class OrderInvoice
OrderInvoice.totalDiscount is the discounted amount of price to be subtracted from OrderInvoice.grandTotal.
totalGST - Variable in class OrderInvoice
OrderInvoice.totalGST is the amount of tax to be added to the OrderInvoice.grandTotal.
totalPrice - Variable in class OrderInvoice
Is the sum of all orders, which include both the price of AlaCarte and SetPackage multiplied with corresponding requested quantities.
type - Variable in class AlaCarte
Class AlaCarte inherits attributes and methods from superclass Item
